thread.section_title: InterContinental Paris Le Grand - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ideal location in a landmark building
thread.title_full: Ideal location in a landmark building - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eric A
title: Ideal location in a landmark building
text:
The hotel had everything we wanted: a central Paris location near the Palais Garnier, Galeries Lafayette and Printemps, a Metro station across the street, a two-minute walk to the airport bus to Charles de Gaulle, a club lounge, and the wonderful, if a bit pricey, Cafe de la Paix on the ground floor. We spent three perfect days there, leaving for home Christmas morning. The staff were very friendly and helpful, our room was large and comfortable, and with the exception of a middle-of-the-night fire alarm caused, we were told during checkout the next morning, by a guest smoking in his room, our stay was memorable. We look forward to our next stay.
Room Tip: Opt for the executive rooms. Classic rooms can be tiny. See more room tips
